description.value:
The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod + 1 type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod + 1 type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

A 15­-foot­-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save con 12 format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned}. While &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} in this way, a target takes [[/damage 1d10 type=poison average=true]] damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of Holy Water (flask);holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a [[/save con 12 format=long]] or be &Reference[stunned]{stunned} until the end of the vrock's next turn.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Magic Resistance. The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Reduced Threat. This creature has -2 penalty on all ability checks and saving throws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
